item.description:
Join the Massachusetts Sierra Club as we celebrate 40 years of protecting the environment in New England. In 1969, a hardy group of Sierra Club members made a decision... it was time to "think globally and act locally." The statement would pave the way - less than a year later - for the formal founding in 1970 of the New England Sierra Club. This year, Sierrans across Massachusetts and New England are celebrating 40 years of protecting our region's environment. Help us celebrate 40 years of Sierra Club presence in Massachusetts: Do you have a story, memory or interesting fact from the past 40 years you would like to share? We're enlisting your help to create a history which we can display at our event in October. Visit our website to post your story. $50 admission.

To RSVP, contact Danielle Piscatelli, 617-423-5775 or danielle@sierraclubmass.org or visit www.sierraclubmass.org/40th.htm

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Massachussetts Sierra Club 40th Anniversary Celebration
